deity.name: Torag
deity.description: God of the forge, protection, strategy

move.all: Walk 60 ft., Swim 60 ft., Fly 250 ft.

vision.all: Blindsense (60 ft.), Darkvision (120 ft.), Low-Light Vision

skills.list_mods: Acrobatics +0, Appraise +14, Bluff +13, Climb +22, Diplomacy +15, Fly +19, Heal +18, Intimidate +15, Knowledge (Arcana) +13, Sense Motive +13, Survival +28, Swim +24

feat.name: Acrobatic
feat.description: You are skilled at leaping, jumping, and flying.

feat.name: Combat Casting
feat.description: You are adept at spellcasting when threatened or distracted.

feat.name: Craft Magic Arms and Armor
feat.description: You can create magic armor, shields, or weapons.

feat.name: Craft Wondrous Item
feat.description: You can create wondrous items, a type of magic item.

feat.name: Eschew Materials
feat.description: You can cast many spells without needing to utilize minor material components.

feat.name: Extend Spell
feat.description: You can make your spells last twice as long.

feat.name: Flyby Attack
feat.description: This creature can make an attack before and after it moves while flying.

feat.name: Hover
feat.description: This creature can hover in place with ease and can kick up clouds of dust and debris.

feat.name: Multiattack
feat.description: This creature is particularly skilled at making attacks with its natural weapons.

ability_object.name: Bite
ability_object.description: This is a primary attack that deals the indicated damage plus 1-1/2 times the dragon's Strength bonus (even though it has more than one attack). A dragon's bite attack has reach as if the creature were one size category larger (+10 feet for Colossal dragons).

ability_object.name: Blindsense
ability_object.description: Range 60 ft.; Other creatures have blindsense, a lesser ability that lets the creature notice things it cannot see, but without the precision of blindsight. The creature with blindsense usually does not need to make Spot or Listen checks to notice and locate creatures within range of its blindsense ability, provided that it has line of effect to that creature. Any opponent the creature cannot see has total concealment (50% miss chance) against the creature with blindsense, and the blindsensing creature still has the normal miss chance when attacking foes that have concealment. Visibility still affects the movement of a creature with blindsense. A creature with blindsense is still denied its Dexterity bonus to Armor Class against attacks from creatures it cannot see.

ability_object.name: Breath Weapon
ability_object.description: 70' Cone of Fire 24d10 Fire, DC 34, usable every 1d4 rounds. Breath weapons allow a Reflex save for half damage. You are immune to your own breath weapon.

ability_object.name: Breath Weapon
ability_object.description: 70' Cone of Weakening Gas, DC 34 or -12 STR, usable every 1d4 rounds. Breath weapons allow a Reflex save for half damage. You are immune to your own breath weapon.

ability_object.name: Breath Weapon
ability_object.description: Using a breath weapon is a standard action. A dragon can use its breath weapon once every 1d4 rounds, even if it possesses more than one breath weapon. A breath weapon always starts at an intersection adjacent to the dragon and extends in a direction of the dragon's choice. Breath weapons come in two shapes, lines and cones, whose areas vary with the dragon's size. If a breath weapon deals damage, those caught in the area can attempt Reflex saves to take half damage. The save DC against a breath weapon is 10 + 1/2 dragon's HD + dragon's Con modifier. Saves against various breath weapons use the same DC; the type of saving throw is noted in the variety descriptions. A dragon can use its breath weapon when it is grappling or being grappled.

ability_object.name: Change Shape
ability_object.description: A very young or older gold dragon can assume any animal or humanoid form three times per day as if using polymorph.

ability_object.name: Claw
ability_object.description: These primary attacks deal the indicated damage plus the dragon's Strength bonus.

ability_object.name: Crush
ability_object.description: A flying or jumping Huge or larger dragon can land on foes as a standard action, using its whole body to crush them. Crush attacks are effective only against opponents three or more size categories smaller than the dragon. A crush attack affects as many creatures as fit in the dragon's space. Creatures in the affected area must succeed on a Reflex save (DC 34) or be pinned, automatically taking bludgeoning damage during the next round unless the dragon moves off them. If the dragon chooses to maintain the pin, it must succeed at a combat maneuver check as normal. Pinned foes take damage from the crush each round if they don't escape. A crush attack deals 4d8+24.

ability_object.name: Damage Reduction
ability_object.description: Dragons gain damage reduction as they age, as indicated on each dragon's specific entry. Their natural weapons are treated as magic weapons for the purpose of overcoming damage reduction.

ability_object.name: Darkvision
ability_object.description: Range 120 ft.; Darkvision is the extraordinary ability to see with no light source at all, out to a range specified for the creature. Darkvision is black and white only (colors cannot be discerned). It does not allow characters to see anything that they could not see otherwise-invisible objects are still invisible, and illusions are still visible as what they seem to be. Likewise, darkvision subjects a creature to gaze attacks normally. The presence of light does not spoil darkvision.

ability_object.name: Detect Gems
ability_object.description: A young or older gold dragon can detect gems three times per day. This functions as locate object, but can only be used to locate gemstones.

ability_object.name: Divine Aid
ability_object.description: Once a week, a great wyrm gold dragon can call upon celestial powers for aid. This functions as a miracle.

ability_object.name: Dragon Senses
ability_object.description: Dragons have darkvision 120 ft. and blindsense 60 ft. They see four times as well as a human in dim light and twice as well in normal light.

ability_object.name: Fast Flight
ability_object.description: A young or older gold dragon is treated as one size category larger when determining his fly speed.

ability_object.name: Fire Aura
ability_object.description: An old or older gold dragon is surrounded by an aura of fire. All creatures within 10 feet of the dragon take 2d6 points of fire damage at the beginning of the dragon's turn. The dragon can activate or suppress this aura as a free action.

ability_object.name: Frightful Presence
ability_object.description: A dragon's frightful presence has a range equal to 30 feet x the dragon's age category [360'], but otherwise functions as detailed on page 300.

ability_object.name: Immunities
ability_object.description: Every dragon is immune to sleep and paralysis. In addition, a dragon is immune to one or two additional forms of attack no matter what its age, as given in its description.

ability_object.name: Immunity to Fire
ability_object.description: You never take fire damage.

ability_object.name: Immunity to Magical Sleep
ability_object.description: You are never subject to magic sleep effects.

ability_object.name: Immunity to Paralysis
ability_object.description: You can never be paralyzed.

ability_object.name: Low-Light Vision
ability_object.description: You can see x4 as far as humans in low illumination. Characters with low-light vision have eyes that are so sensitive to light that they can see twice as far as normal in dim light. Low-Light Vision is color vision. A spellcaster with low-light vision can read a scroll as long as even the tiniest candle flame is next to her as a source of light. Characters with low-light vision can see outdoors on a moonlit night as well as they can during the day.

ability_object.name: Luck
ability_object.description: Once per day an adult or older gold dragon can touch a gem, usually one embedded in the dragon's hide, and enspell it to bring good luck. As long as the dragon carries the gem, it and every good creature within a given radius of it (120 ft.) receives a +1 luck bonus on all saving throws. If the dragon gives an enspelled gem to another creature, only that bearer gets the bonus. The effect lasts 1d3+12 hours. This ability is the equivalent of a 2nd-level spell.

ability_object.name: Spell-Like Abilities
ability_object.description: A dragon's caster level for its spelllike abilities is equal to its total Hit Dice.

ability_object.name: Spell Resistance
ability_object.description: As dragons grow older, they become more resistant to spells and spell-like abilities, as indicated in the dragon descriptions. A dragon's SR is equal to 11 + its CR.

ability_object.name: Spells
ability_object.description: A dragon knows and casts arcane spells as a sorcerer of the level indicated in its specific description. Its caster level depends on its age, as shown for each type.

ability_object.name: Tail Slap
ability_object.description: The dragon can slap one foe each round with its tail. A tail slap is a secondary attack that deals the indicated damage plus 1-1/2 times the dragon's Strength bonus (this is an exception to the normal secondary attack rules).

ability_object.name: Tail Sweep
ability_object.description: This allows a Gargantuan or larger dragon to sweep with its tail as a standard action. The sweep affects a half-circle with a radius of 30 feet (or 40 feet for a Colossal dragon), extending from an intersection on the edge of the dragon's space in any direction. Creatures within the swept area are affected if they are four or more size categories smaller than the dragon. A tail sweep automatically deals 2d8+24. Affected creatures can attempt Reflex saves to take half damage (DC 34).

ability_object.name: Vulnerability to Cold
ability_object.description: You take half again as much (+50%) damage as normal from Cold, regardless of whether a saving throw is allowed, or if the save is a success or failure

ability_object.name: Wing
ability_object.description: The dragon can slam foes with its wings, even when flying. Wing attacks are secondary attacks that deal the indicated damage plus 1/2 the dragon's Strength bonus.

templates.list: Base Dragon HD (8), Dragon (Colossal), Dragon Attacks HD (8), Dragon Size HD (8)

spell.name: Bless
spell.effect: Bless fills your allies with courage.
spell.target: The caster and all allies within a 50-ft. burst, centered on the caster
spell.description: Bless fills your allies with courage.

spell.name: Daylight
spell.effect: You touch an object when you cast this spell, causing the object to shed bright light in a 60-foot radius.
spell.description: You touch an object when you cast this spell, causing the object to shed bright light in a 60-foot radius.

spell.name: Detect Evil
spell.effect: You can sense the presence of evil.
spell.description: You can sense the presence of evil.

spell.name: Foresight
spell.effect: This spell grants you a powerful sixth sense in relation to yourself or another.
spell.description: This spell grants you a powerful sixth sense in relation to yourself or another.

spell.name: Geas/Quest
spell.effect: This spell functions similarly to lesser geas, except that it affects a creature of any HD and allows no saving throw.
spell.description: This spell functions similarly to lesser geas, except that it affects a creature of any HD and allows no saving throw.

spell.name: Sunburst
spell.effect: Sunburst causes a globe of searing radiance to explode silently from a point you select.
spell.description: Sunburst causes a globe of searing radiance to explode silently from a point you select.

spell.name: Acid Splash
spell.effect: You fire a small orb of acid at the target dealing 1d3 points of acid damage.
spell.description: You fire a small orb of acid at the target dealing 1d3 points of acid damage.

spell.name: Create Water
spell.effect: This spell generates wholesome, drinkable water, just like clean rain water.
spell.description: This spell generates wholesome, drinkable water, just like clean rain water.

spell.name: Detect Magic
spell.effect: You detect magical auras.
spell.description: You detect magical auras.

spell.name: Detect Poison
spell.effect: You determine whether a creature, object, or area has been poisoned or is poisonous.
spell.target: Or Area one creature, one object, or a 5-ft. cube
spell.description: You determine whether a creature, object, or area has been poisoned or is poisonous.

spell.name: Flare
spell.effect: This cantrip creates a burst of light.
spell.description: This cantrip creates a burst of light.

spell.name: Ghost Sound
spell.effect: Ghost sound allows you to create a volume of sound that rises, recedes, approaches, or remains at a fixed place.
spell.description: Ghost sound allows you to create a volume of sound that rises, recedes, approaches, or remains at a fixed place.

spell.name: Mage Hand
spell.effect: You point your finger at an object and can lift it and move it at will from a distance.
spell.target: One nonmagical, unattended object weighing up to 5 lbs.
spell.description: You point your finger at an object and can lift it and move it at will from a distance.

spell.name: Mending
spell.effect: This spell repairs damaged objects, restoring 1d4 hit points to the object.
spell.target: One object of up to 19 lb.
spell.description: This spell repairs damaged objects, restoring 1d4 hit points to the object.

spell.name: Open/Close
spell.effect: You can open or close [your choice] a door, chest, box, window, bag, pouch, bottle, barrel, or other container.
spell.target: Object weighing up to 30 lbs. or portal that can be opened or closed
spell.description: You can open or close (your choice) a door, chest, box, window, bag, pouch, bottle, barrel, or other container.

spell.name: Alarm
spell.effect: Alarm creates a subtle ward on an area you select.
spell.target: 20-ft.-radius emanation centered on a point in space
spell.description: Alarm creates a subtle ward on an area you select.

spell.name: Animate Rope
spell.effect: You can animate a nonliving rope-like object.
spell.target: One rope-like object, length up to 145ft.; see text
spell.description: You can animate a nonliving rope-like object.

spell.name: Comprehend Languages
spell.effect: You can understand the spoken words of creatures or read otherwise incomprehensible written messages.
spell.description: You can understand the spoken words of creatures or read otherwise incomprehensible written messages.

spell.name: Cure Light Wounds
spell.effect: When laying your hand upon a living creature, you channel positive energy that cures 1d8+5 points of damage.
spell.description: When laying your hand upon a living creature, you channel positive energy that cures 1d8+(min(5,CASTERLEVEL)) points of damage.

spell.name: Curse Water
spell.effect: This spell imbues a flask [1 pint] of water with negative energy, turning it into unholy water.
spell.description: This spell imbues a flask (1 pint) of water with negative energy, turning it into unholy water.

spell.name: Acid Arrow
spell.effect: An arrow of acid springs from your hand and speeds to its target dealing 2d4 points of acid damage.
spell.description: An arrow of acid springs from your hand and speeds to its target dealing 2d4 points of acid damage.

spell.name: Alter Self
spell.effect: You can assume the form of any Small or Medium creature of the humanoid type.
spell.description: You can assume the form of any Small or Medium creature of the humanoid type.

spell.name: Cat's Grace
spell.effect: The transmuted creature becomes more graceful, agile, and coordinated granting a +4 enhancement bonus to Dexterity.
spell.description: The transmuted creature becomes more graceful, agile, and coordinated granting a +4 enhancement bonus to Dexterity.

spell.name: Eagle's Splendor
spell.effect: The transmuted creature becomes more poised, articulate, and personally forceful gaining a +4 enhancement bonus to Charisma.
spell.description: The transmuted creature becomes more poised, articulate, and personally forceful gaining a +4 enhancement bonus to Charisma.

spell.name: Fox's Cunning
spell.effect: The target becomes smarter granting a +4 enhancement bonus to Intelligence.
spell.description: The target becomes smarter granting a +4 enhancement bonus to Intelligence.

spell.name: Arcane Sight
spell.effect: This spell makes your eyes glow blue and allows you to see magical auras within 120 feet of you.
spell.description: This spell makes your eyes glow blue and allows you to see magical auras within 120 feet of you.

spell.name: Blink
spell.effect: You "blink" quickly back and forth between the Material Plane and the Ethereal Plane and look as though you're winking in and out of reality at random.
spell.description: You "blink" quickly back and forth between the Material Plane and the Ethereal Plane and look as though you're winking in and out of reality at random.

spell.name: Fireball
spell.effect: A fireball spell generates a searing explosion of flame that detonates with a low roar and deals 10d6 points of fire damage to every creature within the area.
spell.description: A fireball spell generates a searing explosion of flame that detonates with a low roar and deals (min(10,CASTERLEVEL))d6 points of fire damage to every creature within the area.

spell.name: Globe of Invulnerability
spell.effect: This spell functions like lesser globe of invulnerability, except that it also excludes 4th-level spells and spell-like effects.
spell.description: This spell functions like lesser globe of invulnerability, except that it also excludes 4th-level spells and spell-like effects.

spell.name: Guards and Wards
spell.range: Anywhere within the area to be warded
spell.effect: This powerful spell is primarily used to defend a stronghold or fortress by creating a number of magical wards and effects.
spell.description: This powerful spell is primarily used to defend a stronghold or fortress by creating a number of magical wards and effects.

spell.name: Heal
spell.effect: Heal enables you to channel positive energy into a creature to wipe away injury and afflictions.
spell.description: Heal enables you to channel positive energy into a creature to wipe away injury and afflictions.

spell.name: Arcane Sight (Greater)
spell.effect: This spell functions like arcane sight, except that you automatically know which spells or magical effects are active upon any individual or object you see.
spell.description: This spell functions like arcane sight, except that you automatically know which spells or magical effects are active upon any individual or object you see.

spell.name: Teleport (Greater)
spell.effect: This spell functions like teleport, except that there is no range limit and there is no chance you arrive off target.
spell.target: You and touched objects or other touched willing creatures
spell.description: This spell functions like teleport, except that there is no range limit and there is no chance you arrive off target.

spell.name: Vision
spell.effect: This spell functions like legend lore, except that it works more quickly and produces some strain on you.
spell.description: This spell functions like legend lore, except that it works more quickly and produces some strain on you.

spell.name: Antimagic Field
spell.effect: An invisible barrier impervious to most magical effects surrounds you and moves with you.
spell.description: An invisible barrier impervious to most magical effects surrounds you and moves with you.

spell.name: Dimensional Lock
spell.effect: You create a shimmering emerald barrier that completely blocks extradimensional travel.
spell.target: 20-ft.-radius emanation centered on a point in space
spell.description: You create a shimmering emerald barrier that completely blocks extradimensional travel.

spell.name: Shout (Greater)
spell.effect: This spell functions like shout, except that the cone deals 10d6 points of sonic damage.
spell.saveinfo: Fortitude partial or Reflex negates (object); see text
spell.description: This spell functions like shout, except that the cone deals 10d6 points of sonic damage.

spell.name: Teleportation Circle
spell.effect: You create a circle on the floor or other horizontal surface that teleports, as greater teleport, any creature who stands on it to a designated spot.
spell.target: 5-ft.-radius circle that teleports those who activate it
spell.description: You create a circle on the floor or other horizontal surface that teleports, as greater teleport, any creature who stands on it to a designated spot.

spell.name: Wish
spell.effect: Wish is the mightiest spell a wizard or sorcerer can cast. By simply speaking aloud, you can alter reality to better suit you.
spell.description: Wish is the mightiest spell a wizard or sorcerer can cast. By simply speaking aloud, you can alter reality to better suit you.

spell.name: Bless
spell.effect: Bless fills your allies with courage.
spell.target: The caster and all allies within a 50-ft. burst, centered on the caster
spell.description: Bless fills your allies with courage.

spell.name: Daylight
spell.effect: You touch an object when you cast this spell, causing the object to shed bright light in a 60-foot radius.
spell.description: You touch an object when you cast this spell, causing the object to shed bright light in a 60-foot radius.

spell.name: Detect Evil
spell.effect: You can sense the presence of evil.
spell.description: You can sense the presence of evil.

spell.name: Foresight
spell.effect: This spell grants you a powerful sixth sense in relation to yourself or another.
spell.description: This spell grants you a powerful sixth sense in relation to yourself or another.

spell.name: Geas/Quest
spell.effect: This spell functions similarly to lesser geas, except that it affects a creature of any HD and allows no saving throw.
spell.description: This spell functions similarly to lesser geas, except that it affects a creature of any HD and allows no saving throw.

spell.name: Sunburst
spell.effect: Sunburst causes a globe of searing radiance to explode silently from a point you select.
spell.description: Sunburst causes a globe of searing radiance to explode silently from a point you select.
